content.rendered:
What is a business introduction website?

  • Do you have a business and want to bring your products and services to more customers on the Internet?
  • Are you a new business and want a professional place to promote your brand?
  • Have you heard about custom website design but don't understand it clearly?…

Don't worry, at L2T Solutions, we will have the right answer for you.

A business introduction website is a type of website that provides all business information, including:

  • Basic information, operating history
  • Products, services of the business
  • Company values, mission, vision
  • Many other types of specific information
Owning a business website is a very important factor, expanding opportunities to find potential customers.

Service pack

Using template

Suitable for new businesses and individuals

  • Adjust your design based on a template
  • Delivery time: >10 days
  • Page loading speed is under 2 seconds
  • Free 1 year .com or .net domain name
  • Support importing 20 articles and products upon delivery
  • Optimize Google SEO
  • Lifetime website warranty
View templates

New design

Design exclusive UI & features upon request

  • New design of exclusive brand identity interface
  • Delivery time: >30 days
  • Page loading speed is under 2 seconds
  • Free 1 year .com or .net domain name
  • Support importing 20 articles and products upon delivery
  • Optimize Google SEO
  • Lifetime website warranty
  • Free 1 year hosting
  • Free 5 standard SEO articles
  • Free business email (name@tencongty.com)
Register now

What will you get?

Modern interface

  • Rules of arrangement and organization
  • Use appropriate font and font size
  • Color palette suitable for each type of business
  • Images and illustrations are appropriate in size and content
  • Appropriate white space
  • Principles of visual orientation
  • Reasonable contrast for all users
  • The general “personality” of the website (e.g. serious, professional, bright, etc.)
  • And many other factors…

Page loading speed under 2s

  • Optimize image size
  • Optimize font display
  • Use the latest version + automatically update programming tools and plugins
  • Lazy loading (load the page only when needed)
  • CSS, JS & HTML Minification (optimize code file size)
  • Caching (temporary cache)
  • CDN (backs up copies of the website on many different servers)
  • Optimize underground processes
  • Paginate articles and comments appropriately
  • And many other techniques are applied…

Optimize SEO standards

  • Configure robots.txt file
  • Create sitemaps for each website language
  • Matching and unique title and meta description tags
  • Rules for using headers
  • Appropriate title and alt tags for each image
  • Install Premium SEO support tools (Yoast SEO, RankMath, AIO SEO,...)
  • Configure and connect Google Analytics and Google Search Console
  • Language format tag for each page content 
  • And other mandatory requirements…

Refer to the Website sample

• Get consultation

Do you need advice on suitable models?

Our team of professional designers will provide other interface warehouses, or advise on designing a new interface that is most suitable for you!

Get free consultation

Outstanding project

Education

Happy Kids Education – STEM school in the US

Happy Kids Education is a comprehensive STEM education center that helps shape future leaders with passion and excellence. The center offers academic programs including robotics, programming, digital arts, career planning and study abroad consulting for a complete learning experience.

Business

Ngoc Hoa Tailor – Tailor with a long tradition

Ngoc Hoa Tailor is a reputable tailor with a history of more than four decades, starting with Mr. Tran Dac Qua and inherited by his son, Tran Duc Hoa, providing customized tailoring, editing services costumes and provide wedding services.

Education

GE Group – Website consulting for studying abroad in Germany

GE Group is an organization specializing in providing comprehensive education and study abroad services, helping students explore study and career opportunities around the world.

• Process

Our approach to new projects

With the motto "don't sell services, just solve problems", we approach each project with a streamlined process, promoting quality. We view each project as an opportunity to be part of your own success story!

Requirements analysis

Listen, put ourselves in the business to understand in the most comprehensive way

Design the UI

Select/design interface as well as features, inform specific plans before implementation

Deployment

Develop the website based on the proposed plan, reporting progress every week

Get feedback

Get customer feedback after each major milestone is completed for timely refinement

Maintenance

Bringing website to the world, monitoring operations, regular maintenance and fixing if errors occur
